import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Delete organization by ID"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/organizations/{OrganizationId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Deletes a single organization by OrganizationId. Use this when you need to retire a specific organization record and you have already confirmed it is safe to remove.

**Prerequisites**
1. **OrganizationId** - Use [GET /api/v1.0/organizations/query](/docs/api/organizations/get-organizations-by-query-get) and extract `Items[].OrganizationId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Confirm the organization details with [GET /api/v1.0/organizations/\{OrganizationId\}](/docs/api/organizations/get-organization).
2. Call [DELETE /api/v1.0/organizations/\{OrganizationId\}](/docs/api/organizations/delete-organization) to remove the record.

**Minimal Required Fields**: OrganizationId path parameter.

**Notes**: This API version is deprecated and performs a destructive action.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"OrganizationId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

>
  
</StatusCodes>
